attr.title: X-YZE
attr.desc: A bump combat action game (pronounced "excise") with a mysterious short story.
attr.inst: Download free at itch.io (https://chrislsound.itch.io/x-yze), download X-YZE (Windows), extract, and copy the .exe to the xyze port fodler.
attr.inst_md: Download free at [itch.io](https://chrislsound.itch.io/x-yze), download `X-YZE (Windows)`, extract, and copy the `.exe` to the `xyze` port fodler.
